RIGHT AT HOME WITH THE RIGHT HOME HEALTH

Get Started

Efficiency

An integrated system that automatically filter only the agencies that are appropriate and personalized to the patient, increasing productivity for hospitals, home health agencies, and insurance providers.

Compliance Risk Avoidance

A safeguard towards staying in compliance, whereby the only home health agencies chosen are those personally recommended and chosen by the patient.

Improved Patient Outcomes

Quick, transparent and personaliized recommendations, reducing the odds of rehsopitalization and increasing overall quality care.

About Haoma

Our product is an integrated home health referral system aimed to mitigate existing inefficient communication streams, enable a streamlined discharge process, and optimize the time for a patient to get care, as well as the quality.

The system will primarily be a recommendation dashboard for discharge planners to quickly and seamlessly generate home health agency recommendations personalized to the patient, with clear and relevant comparison metrics. The use of real-time readmissions data ensures that the system continues to improve, optimizing for quality patient care.

It will also act as a platform where all parties are integrated, having access to the same platform and database to eliminate prior discrepancies. Most of all, itâ€™s a platform enabling patients to get personalized recommendations, faster care, and true transparency.

Haoma is built on the three fundamental pillars:

  • Increased Productivity
  • Reduced Compliance Risk
  • Improved Patient Outcomes

Frequently Asked Questions

  • How are the recommendations made?

    We begin by filtering out agencies that do not serve the patient's area or do not offer the services the patient requires. Afterwards, the patient's referral chart is used to create a personalized recommendation of the top 20 home health agencies based on curated, personalized metrics. The synthesized score from the personalized metrics is called the Haoma Score. In the future, our recommendation algorithm will use real-time readmissions information to provide a very high quality and personalized recommendation.

  • What factors contribute to the Haoma Score?

    The Haoma Score is the rating given to a home health agency particular to each patient. Our system flags certain keywords in the patient pdf and synthesizes general and flagged metrics to create a personalized rating.
